definitions.title: Qal
definitions.body: dub.; [[ודכה]] ([[יׇשׁׂחַ]]) Ps 10:10 Kt is rd. as

definitions.title: Qal
definitions.body: Pf. [[וְדָבָה]] consec. by RobGes Ol De al., i.e. and he is crushed, or and he croucheth (Qr [[יִדְכֶּה]] Impf. so AV RV he croucheth); others rd. [[וְדָכֶה יׇשׁׂחַ]] (adj. intrans. or passive) and crushed he sinketh down, cf. VB Che; possible wd. be [[יִדָּכֶה]] Niph. (‖[[יׇשׁׂחַ]] and [[ונפל]]).

definitions.title: Niph.
definitions.body: Pf. [[וְנִדְכֵּ֫יתִי]] Ps 38:9; Pt. [[נִדְכֶּה]] Ps 51:19; —be crushed, broken, of physical distress Ps 38:9 (‖[[נְפוּגׁתִי]]); be contrite ([[לֵב נִדְכֶּה]]) Ps 51:19 (‖[[נִשְׁבָּר]]).

definitions.title: Pi.
definitions.body: Pf. [[דִּכִּיתָ]] Ps 51:10; sf. [[דִּכִּיתָנוּ]] Ps 44:20; crush down, of divine wrath; c. acc. Ps 44:20, and crush to pieces, obj. ref. to [[עחמות]], in metaph. Ps 51:10.—[[דָּכוּ֨]] Nu 11:8 v. [[דוך]].
